name: 腾起之蛇
description:
Understand the truth of the matter through many adventures

And with the unique Oriental geomantic omen and Qimen escape armor to solve the puzzle to complete the trial

This game includes the geomantic omen,the art of becoming invisible -- Daoist magic,Purple Star Astrology,Plum blossom number , military formation in Eight Trigrams form

It's all shown in a very simple way that I believe everyone can play customs clearance.

Complete this trial and prepare for the challenges ahead.

This is a first person perspective decryption adventure game, using Oriental Taoism as the basic, while adding a certain element of plot exploration.

If you like some fortune telling methods in Taoism, please try this game. It will teach you some basic knowledge of Taoism.

Have a good game.
